Posts.EditableText:
Hi there,
I just started making text adventures with Quest, but when I went to make a game, it said that it couldn't process the request. Can you please help me on this? I can't find any other topics talking about this.
Posts.HTML:
Hi there,
I just started making text adventures with Quest, but when I went to make a game, it said that it couldn't process the request. Can you please help me on this? I can't find any other topics talking about this.

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

It sounds like you're trying to use the online editor to create a Quest 5 game.  I saw a thread (somewhere) that said we have to use "https" rather than "http" for some reason.

Try starting from here: https://textadventures.co.uk/create
Posts.HTML:
Hello.

It sounds like you're trying to use the online editor to create a Quest 5 game. I saw a thread (somewhere) that said we have to use "https" rather than "http" for some reason.

Try starting from here: https://textadventures.co.uk/create

Posts.EditableText: Yes, that worked! Thank you, K.V!

Yay!

mrangel is actual the one who originally posted that solution.  I just can't find it to link to it.  Just to give credit where credit is due.

...but yay!
